Package: io.vertx.ext.dropwizard.reporters

[Java] Class JmxReporter

    • io.vertx.ext.dropwizard.reporters.JmxReporter
    • All Implemented Interfaces and Traits:
      Closeable

      public class JmxReporter

      A reporter which listens for new metrics and exposes them as namespaced MBeans. Copyright 2010-2013 Coda Hale and Yammer, Inc. NOTE: This class has been forked from the http://metrics.codahale.com/ project which is licensed under aslv2. -- Changes -- 2014-08-07 nscavell: remove the dependency on slf4j and use the Vert.x logger instead.
